mapper.insert: insert into cn_user (cn_user_id, cn_user_name, cn_user_password, cn_user_token, cn_user_nick) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{token}, #{nick})
mapper.select: select cn_user_id as id, cn_user_name as name, cn_user_password as password, cn_user_token as token, cn_user_nick as nick from cn_user where cn_user_id=#{id}
select cn_user_id as id, cn_user_name as name, cn_user_password as password, cn_user_token as token, cn_user_nick as nick from cn_user where cn_user_name=#{name}
